chapter.title: City_Time Developer Guide
chapter.para: The City_Time project implements a 3 dimensional visualization of a Traffic map file and adds time functionality.

This document is structured as follows:
Overview
BON-Diagram to get an overview.
Widgets
Description of the classes that are responsible for the user interface.
Time
How does the time work?
Travelers
How are the travelers created?
Notes
Notes from the developer of City_Time.
